name: Home Health Care
details: Provide medical care in patients' homes, including wound care, medication administration, and monitoring of chronic conditions.

name: Hospice Care
details: Offer end-of-life care, focusing on pain management, emotional support, and comfort for terminally ill patients.

name: Pediatric Nursing
details: Provide care for infants, children, and adolescents in various settings such as hospitals, clinics, and homes.

name: Geriatric Nursing
details: Care for elderly patients, managing chronic diseases, promoting mobility, and preventing falls.

name: Surgical Nursing
details: Assist in preoperative, intraoperative, and postoperative care for surgical patients.

name: Community Health Nursing
details: Focus on improving the health of communities through education, preventive care, and health promotion activities.

name: School Nursing
details: Provide healthcare services in schools, managing student health, administering medications, and promoting healthy lifestyles.

name: Emergency Room Nursing
details: Deliver urgent care to patients in emergency situations, stabilizing conditions and providing life-saving treatments.

name: Occupational Health Nursing
details: Focus on health and safety in the workplace, preventing injuries, and managing occupational health issues.

name: Mental Health Nursing
details: Provide care for patients with mental health conditions, including therapy, medication management, and crisis intervention.
